reviews.review_msg: -Honestly she stutters so much you lose your train of thought, and i went from having 90% average in english 12 and my essays too getting 5's and 6's out of tens on hers.. - I would NEVER ever take her EVER again LOL.

Be prepared to hear endlessly about the Inuit. Every single example relates back to them. Also, her exams are brutal. Very fine details from a reading that are irrelevant. Near impossible multiple choice.
